==Tutorial==
{{See also|Elemental Trial}}
[[File:Tutorial Elemental Trial Vaporize 1.png|200px|thumb|left]]
When {{Pyro}} meets {{Hydro}}, Vaporize occurs. Vaporize causes the triggering source of {{Hydro}} or {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to receive a certain DMG Bonus. If the triggering DMG type is {{Hydro}}, it will receive a greater DMG Bonus than {{Pyro}}.
[[File:Tutorial Elemental Trial Vaporize 2.png|200px|thumb|left]][[File:Tutorial Elemental Trial Vaporize 3.png|200px|thumb|left]]
Use {{Pyro}} attacks in battle to infuse opponents with {{Pyro}}. Then, switch to a {{Hydro}} character and use {{Hydro}} attacks to trigger Vaporize and increase the DMG dealt to defeat your opponents swiftly!
{{Clr}}
